channel.title: Connecting to my server?
channel.description:
hello, i got a little problem i want to release my server but i got connecting problems i portforwarded my computer and installed no-ip.. i made an ip and i the clients ip to my ip and it wont connect
somebody help plz

item.title: Connecting to my server?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Check your port via canyouseeme.org

Read full topic

item.title: Connecting to my server?
item.dc:creator: @get_a_life1 get_a_life
item.description:
@get_a_life1 wrote:

[quote=“tehsandbox, post:3, topic:394945”]did you use a open portal check tool like the one from portforwad.com to make sure your 43594,5555 port is open?[/quote] i gonna try that open portal check and yes its 43594

Read full topic
